title: Chief Executive Officer/Executive Director Interview
Application Type: I applied in-person. The process took 5 days. I interviewed at S.E.E.D. Institute (Richmond, VA) in Nov 2011
Interview Descriptions: Initial interview too less than thirty minutes. CEO contacted me with in five days. The interview as the CEO, questions were related to services that I could apply to incoming member of the organization. I was requested to add some training of staff on computer skills and knowledge of different software programs
Interview Questions: I was asked how would I be able to trained my daughter if she is accepted to the program.
